content: प्रश्लिष्ट {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Twisted, entwined. {@--2@} Reasonable, well-argued or reasoned (युक्तियुत). --ष्टः {@--1@} A term applied to the Saṃdhi of the vowel अ with a following vowel and of other vowels with other homegeneous ones. {@--2@} The vowel resulting from this Saṃdhi. {@--3@} The accent with which such substituted vowel is pronounced.
